results.title: When the Treatment Becomes the Problem.
results.text_hl: He was evaluated at another clinic where he was prescribed @CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068900 @@@sitagliptin@@@/@CHEMICAL_Metformin @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Sitagliptin_Phosphate_Metformin_Hydrochloride_Drug_Combination</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D000068899 @@@Janumet@@@) for his uncontrolled @<m>DISEASE_Hyperglycemia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D006943 @@@hyperglycemia@@@.
